attributes.action: Getting a Sadiq Khan out of office
attributes.additional_details:
Us Londoners would like Sadiq Khan to be kicked out of office and ULEZ to be scrapped it's killing London's economy 
The London  we need someone who can make TFL work and more affordable for people to use crime to go down in short Khan needs to go
attributes.background:
To get Sadiq Khan out of the office and someone new to take over sadi Khan's job
The ULEZ scheme is killing London and the poorest people In and around London we need a new mayor of London.end of

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for elected representatives to be removed from office.

If you are concerned about the ULEZ the London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
